hero.title: Exceptional Branded Residences
hero.subtitle: Design by Pininfarina
hero.btn: Premium Apartments starting from AED 3.5M / USD 970K

text.paragraph-1: Iconic Residences by Pininfarina reflect Italian luxury, modern innovation and European craftsmanship in the heart of Dubai. These Branded Residences are created for those who appreciate sophistication, comfort and a prestigious address.
text.list-1: Exclusive Pininfarina design defined by contemporary elegance and precise architectural detailing.
text.list-2: Spectacular seascape and iconic skyline views that encompass Palm Jumeirah, Dubai Marina and the Burj Al Arab.
text.list-3: Generous, well-proportioned layouts complemented by balconies and terraces that open fully to the views.
text.list-4: Refined materials, including premium wood and marble finishes that elevate the quality of every residence.
text.paragraph-2: Living at Iconic Residences means choosing exceptional quality, elevated comfort and a truly refined lifestyle in Dubai.

location.title: Central Location
location.text: Perfectly positioned in the heart of Dubai, close to Palm Jumeirah and Burj Al Arab, ICONIC Residences offer unmatched connectivity and effortless access to the city’s most renowned destinations.

payments.title: Payment Plan
payments.text: Convenient payment schedule designed for comfort and flexibility.

planList.text: In equal installments within 6 to 30 months from Agreement date

mortgage.title: Mortgage Options
mortgage.text-1: Mortgages are available even if you're not a UAE resident. You can finance up to half the property value and get full support throughout the process.
mortgage.text-2: Support: Full assistance from our mortgage partner — from application to approval.
mortgage.text-4: Up to 50% of property value can be financed.

goldenVisa.title: SECURE YOUR 10-YEAR UAE GOLDEN VISA
goldenVisa.text-1: Invest in Iconic Residences design by Pininfarina and enjoy the exclusive benefits of a 10-year UAE Golden Visa.
goldenVisa.list-2: No restrictions on time spent outside the UAE

form.title: Secure Your Residence at ICONIC
form.text: Fill in your details and our team will contact you shortly with full project information and personalized offers.
form.subtext: By submitting, you agree to our
form.responseMessage-2: Your request has been received. Our team will contact you shortly with full project details.
form.responseMessage-3: You may download the assets below to get more information about Iconic Residences.
